name: Bumper Pool Deluxe
description:
Bumper Pool is an exciting variation of pool in which you battle head-to-head against your opponent to sink all of your balls first! The bumpers on the table are the key to victory; use them skillfully to pull off trick shots or else they can squash your lead. As the name implies this app is DELUXE and includes many ways to play and plenty of challenge and achievements to earn!

Some of the outstanding features of this app include:
- Turn-Based gameplay with your Game Center friends!
- Pass-and-Play with a friend sharing the same device
- Take the Solo Challenge for offline fun!
- Realistic gameplay and pool physics engine
- Leaderboards
- Achievements
- Polished high-resolution retina graphics
- Fun sound effects
- Customizable menu system
- Gameplay Stats
- Universal App that can be played on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch!
